title: DocumentBuddy
description: DocumentBuddy is an AI chat buddy SaaS product i made for my own company Erdem Software. It uses the latest Next.js features with an openai and Stripe integration.

title: Moesland
description: The organization Moesland is a carnival organization in the Netherlands. I was the lead developer in developing their mobile app and CMS using Laravel, React and React Native.

title: Duketown Barbershop Singers
description: The Duketown Barbershop Singers is a barbershop choir in the Netherlands. I was a full stack developer creating their website and CMS using Laravel
